drupalNodeEvent.title: China Now Music Festival: China and Beethoven, "Shanghai Symphony: Night of Beethoven"

field_organizers.processed: US-China Music Institute of the Bard College Conservatory of Music

field_description.processed: Celebrate Beethoven’s birthday with the illustrious Shanghai Symphony, the oldest orchestra in China, featuring a selection of recent performances of some of Beethoven’s most iconic symphonic and chamber works, specially selected for the China Now Music Festival.
